name: Sticky Nights
description:
Damn, finally you earned yourself some vacation! You decide to spend that precious time on a Cruise Ship. But what to do on a Ship with 1000 People out on the wide sea? EXACTLY! PAAAARTYYYYY! You haven't been out in such a long time so you decide to hit on as many sexy people as you can and bring them to your little cozy cabin ;) but OH NO! the weather is exactly like 2020 has been for the whole world ... SHITTY ... so the Party gets a bit shaky. Don't get hit and don't step on Puke because thats not very sexy >_>


________________________________________________


ART - Muminovic Irma 
PROGRAMMING - Kießlich Marcel 
MUSIC - Dalton Fischer, Philipp Schwarz
